content: Head up the stairs beyond the main gate, but check a small alcove to the left first to find a green Wisp guarded by some Worm Practitioners. Be ready to find many of these enemies around the temple, as more than a few of them hide in the tall grass by lying down until you approach.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
Head up the stairs beyond the main gate, but check a small alcove to the left first to find a green Wisp guarded by some Worm Practitioners. Be ready to find many of these enemies around the temple, as more than a few of them hide in the tall grass by lying down until you approach.
